"We highly recommend their quality of work and at a great price." "Hands down, the best experience I have had with home repairs in 25 years." "Owner kept me up on the entire process, and work crew was amazing to watch."

I am absolutely speechless! The team who replaced my roof did an amazing job. Quick, clean, professional and very courteous. I have seen many roofing jobs and thought I knew what to expect…wrong. Honest Roof took off and replaced my roof … More Response from the owner 2 months ago Thank you guys. It feels good when we are recognized for the level of experience and efficiency we bring to each project. After 70 years of practice, we are as close to perfect as it gets. We had an excellent experience with Honest Roof. From start to finish, Dennis made the process simple and stress-free. The quote process was quick, easy, and pressure-free, and his website is packed with valuable information that really … More Response from the owner 3 months ago Thank you Sutton. The people of honest roof along with the installation team were great to deal with from start to finish.
